name: Cyber Beat Ghost Slasher
description:
et charged with fiery music and imagine yourself as a cyberpunk musician and a samurai at the same time. You have two cyber katanas in your hands and you master them masterly. Run and don't stop. It is a real art to masterfully guide your katana in the right direction, cutting the note and producing the enchanting sounds of synth motives.
Combine strikes into beautiful combos, transforming fighting moves into a real cyber dance. Run, slash, dance and dodge like a real ghost samurai runner. You are not obstructed by either lasers or bottomless pits, which you can deftly overcome by running along a steep wall like a swift shadow.
Listen to the sounds of music, let them guide your path and your hand. Music is your assistant, if you merge with it and let the melody determine your actions, then you will become a real virtuoso cyber ghost samurai.
Only the best samurai runners will be able to overcome all levels, located in a variety of locations. Run through the neon city of the future, or run through a cyberspace simulation as if you were a netrunner, or run a race across a completely different planet.
Cyber ​​katana in hand, listen to music and forward, hacking and slashing everything in your path.
